game

Class WorldController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • game.WorldController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class WorldController
extends com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
    Class that handles and processes the input of the GameScreen and updates the game accordingly to the game logic
    Author:
    Enrique Martín Arenal
